titleStmt.title: Articles of agreement had, made, and concluded, between the commissioners of the Right Honorable the Lord Willoughby of Parham, of the one partie; and the commissioners of the Parliament of England, of the other partie: being in order to the rendition of the island of Barbadoes
Treaties, etc. England and Wales, 1652-01-11.
titleStmt.author: Barbados.

titleStmt.title: Articles of agreement had, made, and concluded, between the commissioners of the Right Honorable the Lord Willoughby of Parham, of the one partie; and the commissioners of the Parliament of England, of the other partie: being in order to the rendition of the island of Barbadoes
Treaties, etc. England and Wales, 1652-01-11.
titleStmt.author: Barbados.
Willoughby of Parham, Francis Willoughby, Baron, 1613?-1666.
England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: The agreement, concluded 11 Jan. 1652, transfers control of the Island of Barbadoes to the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Willoughby of Parham, Francis Willoughby, Baron,
